beerTypes.name: Wheat
beerTypes.desc: A light, refreshing beer with a slightly fruity taste.

beerTypes.desc: A crisp, clean lager with a balanced bitterness.

beerTypes.desc: A hoppy, aromatic beer with a punch of bitterness.

beerTypes.name: Bock

beerTypes.name: Stout

beerTypes.name: Porter
